title: Authors and Citation
text: Marc Becker. Maintainer, author. Michel Lang. Contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Becker M (2022). mlr3tuningspaces: Search Spaces Hyperparameter Tuning. https://mlr3tuningspaces.mlr-org.com, https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3tuningspaces.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mlr3tuningspaces: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning},   author = {Marc Becker},   year = {2022},   note = {https://mlr3tuningspaces.mlr-org.com, https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3tuningspaces}, }

title: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning
text: Package website: release Collection search spaces hyperparameter tuning. Includes various search spaces can directly applied mlr3 learner. Additionally, meta information search space can queried.

title: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning
code: library(mlr3tuningspaces)  # tune learner with default search space instance = tune(   method = "random_search",   task = tsk("pima"),   learner = lts(lrn("classif.rpart")),   resampling = rsmp ("holdout"),   measure = msr("classif.ce"),   term_evals = 10 )  # best performing hyperparameter configuration instance$result ##    minsplit minbucket        cp learner_param_vals  x_domain classif.ce ## 1: 4.174471 0.5070691 -4.542023          <list[4]> <list[3]>  0.1953125

title: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning
code: library("data.table")  # print keys and learners as.data.table(mlr_tuning_spaces) ##                         key         learner n_values ##  1:     classif.glmnet.rbv2  classif.glmnet        2 ##  2:       classif.kknn.rbv2    classif.kknn        1 ##  3:  classif.ranger.default  classif.ranger        3 ##  4:     classif.ranger.rbv2  classif.ranger        7 ##  5:   classif.rpart.default   classif.rpart        3 ##  6:      classif.rpart.rbv2   classif.rpart        4 ##  7:     classif.svm.default     classif.svm        4 ##  8:        classif.svm.rbv2     classif.svm        5 ##  9: classif.xgboost.default classif.xgboost        9 ## 10:    classif.xgboost.rbv2 classif.xgboost       13 ## 11:        regr.glmnet.rbv2     regr.glmnet        2 ## 12:          regr.kknn.rbv2       regr.kknn        1 ## 13:     regr.ranger.default     regr.ranger        3 ## 14:        regr.ranger.rbv2     regr.ranger        6 ## 15:      regr.rpart.default      regr.rpart        3 ## 16:         regr.rpart.rbv2      regr.rpart        4 ## 17:        regr.svm.default        regr.svm        4 ## 18:           regr.svm.rbv2        regr.svm        5 ## 19:    regr.xgboost.default    regr.xgboost        9 ## 20:       regr.xgboost.rbv2    regr.xgboost       13 # get tuning space and view tune token tuning_space = lts("classif.rpart.default") tuning_space$values ## $minsplit ## Tuning over: ## range [2, 128] (log scale) ##  ##  ## $minbucket ## Tuning over: ## range [1, 64] (log scale) ##  ##  ## $cp ## Tuning over: ## range [1e-04, 0.1] (log scale) # get learner with tuning space learner = tuning_space$get_learner()  # tune learner instance = tune(   method = "random_search",   task = tsk("pima"),   learner = learner,   resampling = rsmp ("holdout"),   measure = msr("classif.ce"),   term_evals = 10)  instance$result ##    minsplit minbucket        cp learner_param_vals  x_domain classif.ce ## 1: 3.009338  2.506336 -8.291878          <list[4]> <list[3]>  0.2421875

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: abstract base class tuning spaces define search space hyperparameter tuning. TuningSpace objects store list paradox::TuneToken additional meta information. tokens can assigned $values slot learner's paradox::ParamSet.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
code: TuningSpace$new(id, values, tags, learner, package = character())

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: id (character(1)) Identifier new instance. values (list()) List paradox::TuneToken parameter values. tags (character()) Tags group filter tuning spaces. learner (character(1))mlr3::Learner identifier mlr3::mlr_learners. package (character()) Packages provide Learner, e.g. mlr3learners learner mlr3learners::LearnerClassifRanger interfaces ranger package.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: Returns learner TuneToken set parameter set.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
text: ... (named ‘list()’) Passed mlr3::lrn(). Named arguments passed constructor, set parameters paradox::ParamSet, set public field. See mlr3misc::dictionary_sugar_get() details.

title: Tuning Spaces — TuningSpace
code: library(mlr3tuning)  # get default tuning space of rpart learner tuning_space = mlr_tuning_spaces$get("classif.rpart.default")  # get learner and set tuning space learner = lrn("classif.rpart") learner$param_set$values = tuning_space$values  # tune learner instance = tune(  method = "random_search",  task = tsk("pima"),  learner = learner,  resampling = rsmp ("holdout"),  measure = msr("classif.ce"),  term_evals = 10)  instance$result #>    minsplit minbucket        cp learner_param_vals  x_domain classif.ce #> 1: 2.529015 0.2282705 -3.008874          <list[3]> <list[3]>    0.28125

what: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
text: function complements mlr_tuning_spaces functions spirit mlr3::mlr_sugar.

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
code: lts(x)  # S3 method for character lts(x)  # S3 method for Learner lts(x)  ltss(x)

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
text: x (character() | mlr3::Learner) character, key passed dictionary retrieve tuning space. mlr3::Learner, default tuning space added learner.

title: Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
Syntactic Sugar for Tuning Space Construction — lts
code: lts("classif.ranger.default") #> <TuningSpace:classif.ranger.default> #>                 id lower upper      levels logscale #> 1:      mtry.ratio   0.0     1                FALSE #> 2:         replace    NA    NA  TRUE,FALSE    FALSE #> 3: sample.fraction   0.1     1                FALSE #> 4:       num.trees   1.0  2000                FALSE

what: mlr3tuningspaces: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning — mlr3tuningspaces-package
title: mlr3tuningspaces: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning — mlr3tuningspaces-package
text: Collection search spaces hyperparameter tuning. Includes various search spaces can directly applied `mlr3` learner. Additionally, meta information search space can queried.

title: mlr3tuningspaces: Search Spaces for Hyperparameter Tuning — mlr3tuningspaces-package
text: Maintainer: Marc Becker marcbecker@posteo.de (ORCID) contributors: Michel Lang michellang@gmail.com (ORCID) [contributor]

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
text: simple mlr3misc::Dictionary storing objects class TuningSpace. tuning space associated help page, see mlr_tuning_spaces_[id].

title: Dictionary of Tuning Spaces — mlr_tuning_spaces
code: library(data.table) as.data.table(mlr_tuning_spaces) #>                         key         learner n_values #>  1:  classif.glmnet.default  classif.glmnet        2 #>  2:     classif.glmnet.rbv2  classif.glmnet        2 #>  3:    classif.kknn.default    classif.kknn        3 #>  4:       classif.kknn.rbv2    classif.kknn        1 #>  5:  classif.ranger.default  classif.ranger        4 #>  6:     classif.ranger.rbv2  classif.ranger        8 #>  7:   classif.rpart.default   classif.rpart        3 #>  8:      classif.rpart.rbv2   classif.rpart        4 #>  9:     classif.svm.default     classif.svm        4 #> 10:        classif.svm.rbv2     classif.svm        5 #> 11: classif.xgboost.default classif.xgboost        8 #> 12:    classif.xgboost.rbv2 classif.xgboost       13 #> 13:     regr.glmnet.default     regr.glmnet        2 #> 14:        regr.glmnet.rbv2     regr.glmnet        2 #> 15:       regr.kknn.default       regr.kknn        3 #> 16:          regr.kknn.rbv2       regr.kknn        1 #> 17:     regr.ranger.default     regr.ranger        4 #> 18:        regr.ranger.rbv2     regr.ranger        7 #> 19:      regr.rpart.default      regr.rpart        3 #> 20:         regr.rpart.rbv2      regr.rpart        4 #> 21:        regr.svm.default        regr.svm        4 #> 22:           regr.svm.rbv2        regr.svm        5 #> 23:    regr.xgboost.default    regr.xgboost        8 #> 24:       regr.xgboost.rbv2    regr.xgboost       13 #>                         key         learner n_values mlr_tuning_spaces$get("classif.ranger.default") #> <TuningSpace:classif.ranger.default> #>                 id lower upper      levels logscale #> 1:      mtry.ratio   0.0     1                FALSE #> 2:         replace    NA    NA  TRUE,FALSE    FALSE #> 3: sample.fraction   0.1     1                FALSE #> 4:       num.trees   1.0  2000                FALSE

title: Default Tuning Spaces — tuning_spaces_default
text: Bischl B, Binder M, Lang M, Pielok T, Richter J, Coors S, Thomas J, Ullmann T, Becker M, Boulesteix , Deng D, Lindauer M (2021). “Hyperparameter Optimization: Foundations, Algorithms, Best Practices Open Challenges.” 2107.05847, https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.05847.

title: Default Tuning Spaces — tuning_spaces_default
text: eta \([1e-04, 1]\) nrounds \([1, 5000]\) max_depth \([1, 20]\) colsample_bytree \([0.1, 1]\) colsample_bylevel \([0.1, 1]\) lambda \([0.001, 1000]\) alpha \([0.001, 1000]\) subsample \([0.1, 1]\)

title: RandomBot Tuning Spaces — tuning_spaces_rbv2
text: Kuehn D, Probst P, Thomas J, Bischl B (2018). “Automatic Exploration Machine Learning Experiments OpenML.” 1806.10961, https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.10961.

title: RandomBot Tuning Spaces — tuning_spaces_rbv2
text: num.trees \([1, 2000]\) replace [TRUE,FALSE] sample.fraction \([0.1, 1]\) mtry.ratio \([0, 1]\) respect.unordered.factors [“ignore”, “order”, “partition”] min.node.size \([1, 100]\) splitrule [“gini”, “extratrees”] num.random.splits \([1, 100]\) mtry.power replaced mtry.ratio.

title: RandomBot Tuning Spaces — tuning_spaces_rbv2
text: booster [“gblinear”, “gbtree”, “dart”] nrounds \([2, 8]\) eta \([1e-04, 1]\) gamma \([1e-05, 7]\) lambda \([1e-04, 1000]\) alpha \([1e-04, 1000]\) subsample \([0.1, 1]\) max_depth \([1, 15]\) min_child_weight \([1, 100]\) colsample_bytree \([0.01, 1]\) colsample_bylevel \([0.01, 1]\) rate_drop \([0, 1]\) skip_drop \([0, 1]\)

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.1.1.9000
text: feat: add default search space glmnet kknn. feat: as_search_space() function create search spaces TuningSpace objects. Allows pass TuningSpace objects search_space TuningInstanceSingleCrit TuningInstanceMultiCrit.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-19 Fix xgboost.default search space.

title: mlr3tuningspaces 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-03 Fixed citations. Added mtry.ratio hyperparameter ranger tuning spaces. Added print method TuningSpace.
